about_the_game:
"Get Rich" is a thrilling 2D roguelike shooter that plunges you into a corrupt metropolis teeming with danger and intrigue. Join the quest to get revenge and justice in a city riddled with corruption. With procedurally generated levels, every playthrough offers a unique experience, ensuring no two encounters are ever the same.

Key Features:


  • Procedural generation: Each level is dynamically created, offering replayability with new layouts and enemies every time you play. Adapt your strategy to the ever-changing environment.
  • Dynamic Combat System - engage in intense, fast-paced combat with a variety of weapons and abilities at your disposal. Hone your skills, master your timing, and take down corrupt police, criminals, and powerful bosses standing in your way.

  • Unique Ability Tracks - discover and collect music tracks scattered throughout the levels. Upload these tracks to your player to unlock powerful abilities that can turn the tide of battle. Each track offers distinct advantages, allowing for a wide range of tactical options and playstyles.

Story


The city crumbles under the weight of corruption. After a chance encounter with an old friend, Marcus, who is tragically killed under unclear circumstances, MC reveals there is new energy drink that drives criminals mad and the trail leads to the top of the city mightiest politicans. Guided by the enigmatic mafia boss, Mr. Cassilias, and driven by a thirst for vengeance, MC must navigate a web of deceit and treachery.
